name: Holiday Inn Vienna City

reviews.text: As a small business hotel located in the centre of Vienna this Holiday Inn receives excellent marks from me. Reasons why? See below:
reviews.title: Well-maintained, smart looking small rooms

reviews.text: - Friendly staff in reception, bar - very helpful.
reviews.title: Great base for a city break

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: - Smartly designed rooms which work, even if they are on the small side. Comfortable, and functional. Clean, with minibars well stocked.
reviews.title: Not only for biz

reviews.text: - Location is excellent, very close to all sights.
reviews.title: Very good hotel with perfect location

reviews.text: I liked this small business hotel, better than your average holiday inn.
reviews.title: Not sure we will stay there again

reviews.text: It was at the end of my trip I stayed three nights here lovely stay rooms staff placing all excellent made my trip and worth the value I would recommend this hotel to everybody above all staff is very polite and nice only thing I mind is fee of 5 euro on room service even for ice it's bit harsh
reviews.title: One of the best stays

reviews.text: We chose this hotel because it was close to our friend's apartment. As it turned out, it had so many more benefits than just location. The room was clean and just the right size for European standards. The windows blocked out the street noise and we slept like babies. The breakfast was hearty and complete with scrambled eggs, bacon, yogurt, cereal, fruit, pastries. Breakfast was a fair price for hotel guests (7 euro) but an outrageous 17 euro for our friend. Had we known that, she would not have eaten with us. Service was excellent, every staff member greeted us warmly. Parking was the tightest I have ever seen, but doable even for my midsize SUV. The only drawback was the weak wifi, and the allowance for only one device per room. We will definitely stay here again and continue to recommend this hotel to friends.
reviews.title: Perfect for City Visit!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for 4 nights in May. We had the garden view rooms. The rooms were nice and clean. Above all, the service was one of the best we have experienced to date. Marina, Frederide and Julia were excellent. The entire staff at the hotel including the team in the restaurant and breakfast room were very good. They were all very pleasant, helpful and customer oriented. They made our stay extremely pleasant and enjoyable. Thank you to the entire team at this hotel.
reviews.title: Outstanding Customer Service

reviews.text: The good: The hotel was clean, the room spacious and the staff are charming and helpful.
reviews.title: Holiday Inn charged nearly €6,000 on my card for a €2,000 stay

reviews.text: The bad: Holiday Inn charged nearly €6,000 on my card for a €2,000 stay.
reviews.title: COZY HOTEL , A BIT AWAY FROM THE MAIN CITY CENTRE

reviews.text: This is a very good hotel, all departments that I had contact with were very efficient, especially the front desk. I was on a four-night business trip and was very pleased. The hotel is about a 5-10 minute walk from the nearest Metro, which could be a nuisance to some people, but didn't give me any problem. There are plenty of restaurants and shops in the area.
reviews.title: Business Trip June 2013

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here for 2 nights at the end of May 2013.
reviews.title: Excellent Hotel - May 2013

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Got a very warm welcome from the receptionist who very helpfully supplied lots of Information - maps etc. very much appreciated the room upgrade and the free wifi.
reviews.title: Nicely Situated!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was large, with lots of seating space and very clean.
reviews.title: With a little help from my friends at the Holiday Inn

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Hotel situated not far from the City Centre - 5 mins walk to nearest underground station then only a couple of stops from there.
reviews.title: Would absolutely recommend

reviews.text: I stayed here for one night a couple of weeks ago. The room was clean and the A/C worked (though not as cool as I would have liked). The staff and service was good. The breakfast is way overpriced..but other then that, I would highly recommend staying here.
reviews.title: Was good

reviews.text: It is walking distance to the museums, markets, subway, shops, etc. I loved the neighborhood.
reviews.title: Practical for families

reviews.text: Holiday Inn may no be the most charming hotel in Vienna, but it turned out to be a very good choice. With very large family rooms with a separate living part, bath tub and a nice patio for breakfast or a drink in the evening it is very well suited for families with kids. It was very clean with comfortable beds and it was quiet at night. Only one hour of wifi is free, the rest is charged. Breakfast consists of a nice buffet with homemade spreads, pastries and all the standard things on it. The location is very good close to the subway and several restaurants to choose from.
reviews.title: Sehr Gut! Very Good!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A good hotel for those who are traveling in groups and really want a hotel that's worth the price, Holiday Inn doesn't disappoint!
reviews.title: very good

reviews.text: The room was comfortable and room enough for three staying in.
reviews.title: Very good

description: Dear Vienna visitor, because of its central location the Holiday Inn Vienna City is an ideal starting point to explore Vienna. The attractions of Vienna, such as the 'Ring', the State Opera House, the 'Karlskirche', the 'Musikverein', the popular 'Naschmarkt' and the 'Mariahilferstrasse' are only a short walk away from the hotel - the Schoenbrunn Palace, the 'Hofburg' and the Vienna International Centre can comfortably be reached with the underground nearby. All hotel rooms are equipped with High Speed Internet access, in public areas such as the bar, the lobby and the restaurant Wirless Lan is installed. Recreation is offered in the hotel owned steam bath and during the summer months in our romantic garden. In our conference rooms we ensure the smooth operation for your event for up to 50 people. Dear Vienna visitor, we would be delighted to welcome you at our hotel during your stay in Vienna. Yours sincerely, Holiday Inn Vienna City.
